projects.title: Dictionary app
projects.description: Introducing my Dictionary App – your language companion for effortless word exploration and comprehension! This user-friendly and feature-rich app provides an efficient way to look up definitions, synonyms, antonyms, and example usage for any word you encounter.

projects.title: Crypto app
projects.description: Stay up-to-date with real-time market data, price fluctuations, and trends for a vast array of cryptocurrencies. With intuitive charts and analysis tools, this app will assist you to make well-informed decisions and seize investment opportunities.

projects.title: REACT CART
projects.description: Easily add items to your cart with just a tap, and watch your shopping list come to life. This intuitive interface ensures a smooth and efficient shopping process, allowing you to spend less time searching and more time enjoying the things you love.

projects.title: Typing tester
projects.description: Introducing my Typing Speed Tester Application – your gateway to honing your typing skills and mastering the art of fast and accurate typing! Whether you're a seasoned typist aiming to improve your speed or a beginner embarking on your typing journey, this user-friendly app is here to assist and challenge you
